comments:
I've successfully published a simple web project to a new "external" WLS 9.0
generic server; attempts to execute "Run on Server" for the web project
sometimes successfully launch a web brower for the project's root HTML page,
however, I've also encountered the following error intermittently (at least I'm
not clear on what the pattern is at this point; opening the project properties
and re-selecting the server as the default server and then selecting apply
seemed to "fix" it; note: the list of "default" servers included one with the
name "<None>" that is at the top of the list...):

Happens if IWebModule is not loaded when RoS is invoked. I have changed all the
module.getAdapter calls to loadAdapter.
Have not seen this bug again so marking as verified.
